Uses of Interface
Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.IVertexType

  • Packages that use IVertexType 
    Package Description
    Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics  

    • Uses of IVertexType in Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics

      Classes in Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics that implement IVertexType 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VertexPositionColor
      Describes a custom vertex format structure that contains position and color information.
      class  VertexPositionColorTexture
      Describes a custom vertex format structure that contains position, color, and one set of texture coordinates.
      class  VertexPositionNormalTexture
      Describes a custom vertex format structure that contains position, normal data, and one set of texture coordinates.
      class  VertexPositionTexture
      Describes a custom vertex format structure that contains position and one set of texture coordinates.
